E1.desc: Winter is Coming, and the shifting winds come with the migration of the spirits

E25.headline: Trade Poultry and Livestock
E25.desc: Fire Nations trading livestock bred with other nations. The list includes and is limited to: Dragon Moose, Turtle Duck and Hippo Cow

E26.headline: Trade Precious Metals
E26.desc: Fire Nations starts new trade program, trading precious metals with Earth Kingdom and Water Tribe

E27.headline: Fire Nation picks up production of glass
E27.desc: Fire Lord Elizablaze and Fire Prime Minister Truferno announce additional federal funding to factories involved with manafacturing glass

E28.headline: Fire Nation starts new trade deal with Earth Kingdom
E28.desc: Fire Lord Elizablaze and Fire Prime Minister Truferno announce new trade deal made with Earth President Michelle Rockabma and her cabinet

E29.headline: Uproar in the Fire Nation, as Truferno raises taxes
E29.desc: Truferno intorduces carbon tax to reduce green house gas emissions

E30.headline: Fire Nation starts working on urbanization project
E30.desc: The Fire Nation government launches is it's new 5 year urbanization project, brought about by the rapidly rising population

E31.headline: Inventor from the Fire Nations builds the first automobile engine that runs on fuel
E31.desc: Fire Nation sactioned project to make a more powerful engine than the steam engine comes to fruitition

E32.headline: Coal Mine collapses, 100 miners trapped, 20 dead and counting.
E32.desc: Fire Lord and Prime Minister pool all their resources to save the lives of trapped Coal Miners

E33.headline: Fire Nation trades machines and engines that can be used by non benders
E33.desc: In the midst of tensions boiling between benders and non benders, entrpenuers push for a bill to trade tech used by non benders

E34.headline: Fire Nation experiences Steel Industry Boom with the help of Earth corporate leaders
E34.desc: Promoting Earth Kingdom Corporations in Steel trade

E35.headline: Non bender protest turns violent after police intervention
E35.desc: Riot Control squad was deployed in order to intimidate protesters. Protest turns violent

E36.headline: Trade Poultry and Livestock
E36.desc: Water Tribe trading livestock bred with other nations. The list includes and is limited to: Tiger Seal, Arctic Hen and various forms of fish
